title: jeremypwr
author: jeremypwr
created_time: May 09, 2023, 12:10:55 AMLast edit: May 12, 2023, 02:48:57 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC on ABC 4 Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 2 mbtc Free Bet2nd place: 1 mbtc Free Bet3rd place: 0.5 mbtc Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-fight-night-rozenstruik-vs-almeida/matchesMatches(2 points each)12. Jairzinho Rozenstruik vs. Jailton Almeida11. Anthony Smith vs. Johnny Walker10. Daniel Rodriguez vs. Ian Garry9. Tim Means vs. Alex Morono8. Matt Brown vs. Court McGee(1 point each)7. Karl Williams vs. Chase Sherman6. Cody Stamann vs. Douglas Silva de Andrade5. Carlos Ulberg vs. Ihor Potieria4. Natan Levy vs. Pete Rodriguez3. Ji Yeon Kim vs. Mandy Bohm2. Bryan Battle vs. Gabe Green1. Jessica-Rose Clark vs. Tainara LisboaNOT go the Full Distance  Make sure your Prediction is in this format  Example12. Jailton Almeida11. Anthony Smith10. Ian Garry9. Alex Morono8. Court McGee7. Karl Williams 6. Douglas Silva de Andrade5. Carlos Ulberg 4. Natan Levy 3. Ji Yeon Kim 2. Gabe Green1. Jessica-Rose Clark NOT go the Full Distance 5(Small print)* Must be active in Sports betting and/or Sports betting discussion (some exceptions) *** The declared winners are final and up to my discretion **

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.Given the nature of my threads, please do not bother making a Prediction if you have not read the OP and qualify.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.   Thank you for your cooperation.
